website_summaries.verdict: This good quality safe provides a lot of space and comes with a hearty fire and water rating.
pros: A little bigger than other small model cabinet safes
Easy to keep your stuff organized with three shelves inside the safe and extra storage areas on the door
Includes interior LED lighting and lag bolts for securing to the floor or wall
cons: The factory code on this lock is permanently set and cannot be changed
The handle used for opening the door is made from plastic and doesn't have a hearty feel

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy A SentrySafe Product
customer_reviews.text: I never write online reviews, but this product is a scam. I would rate less then one star if possible. Do not buy this safe, because you cannot use it unless you pay SentrySafe more money. I could not figure out how to set the combination to this safe, so I called the customer service number. I was told that to acquire the combination I had to pay $25 online or $35 over the phone. Unfortunately, the safe is now just a heavy box that needs to be discarded. I will never purchase another SentrySafe product.
customer_reviews.author: Keane A.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged n difficult to return
customer_reviews.text: Damaged product. Very heavy n difficult for me to return
customer_reviews.author: nadenebarker

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: I've now purchased 2 of them. Both times had same experience. Safe will not open. Called SentrySafe repeatedly for assistance. No live help provided. On hold. Do NOT buy this item. My experience, "beyond disappointed".
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: great product, with great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this safe from amazon wear house. It was dented but very usable. It came without any paperwork, so we could not open the safe. I called sentry safe company, and they were very helpful. After I was able to prove without any doubt that I was the owner of the safe they in a secure mode of communication sent me the electronic code to open the safe. They are proud of the quality of their product, and give fantastic customer service. Amazon offers great deals at their wear house sight, on tons of bargains.
customer_reviews.author: sharon s

customer_reviews.title: Not Meant for File Folders and a Bit Snug
customer_reviews.text: Daaaa. Guess I should have known that. The interior is a bit snug when compared to a much cheaper lockable folder box that fell apart and was replaced. I have large trust documents that just fit. There is not a lot of space left for the removable tray but I can get in a few flash drives. I like the door sleeve that is great for passports and the key hangers too. Bottom line is that for a modest price I could get a sturdy and secure box (not looking for burglar-proof) that is fairly water tight and most of all has a HIGH and fairly LONG temperature protection for things stored there.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This SentrySafe arrived broken and without an invoice slip. Now we have to pay to send this heavy & broken item back? Unhappy customers...
customer_reviews.author: CRMB

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, sturdy & stylish Sentry safe!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly stylish and sturdy Sentry safe. Small fluorescent light illuminates from door jam when in open mode! Excellent feature for opening in dark closet space. Digital Keypad is solid and easy to program multiple codes. Arrived via Amazon professional Carrier, so box and safe were in perfect condition. NOTHING flimsy about this Sentry safe, well worth the money if not more! 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Should do the job for what I want it for, but the quality could be better. The handle and combination dial are made of plastic, which feels like it could eventually break or crack. If the handle is pressed in the down position while locked, the combination dial can't be turned or feels like it will break if you force it. Roomy enough inside and came with two plastic trays. Everything inside the safe is plastic. Comes with one combination, which cannot be changed.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Locking mechanism broke after light usage. By light usage I mean in about 4 years of ownership, I had opened it two to three times a year. It no longer locks. It's just a fire proof box now.I am shopping for a better safe now, and it will be a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Damen C.

customer_reviews.title: Thick walls, strong lock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe for the store as I wanted something STRONG. I had one of those fingerprint ones, and they werent bad but this is a way better product. It almost stays cool inside as well. Seems insulated and the walls are thick. Someone would have a really really hard time trying to break into this safe
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: There is plenty of room on the inside
customer_reviews.text: The new code was easy to set, and so far we have had no issues with opening it. I will say to leave it in the box until you get it to the room you want to keep it in. There is no easy way to pick this thing up after taking away the box. The rounded corners offer no grip. There is plenty of room on the inside for most of our important documents, and a few keepsakes. We bought the tray for small stuff, and are happy we did so.
customer_reviews.author: Puck

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: regret buying Costco has a bigger version they put on sale for $200. I bought this but the dial is cheap plastic it isn't well made for carrying the sentry name. would have returned but its heavy and would require help or hiring someone to take it back which would cost a lot of money so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: irish mule

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for safes for awhile. This was the largest for the price by far. I am replacing a much smaller a d less secure non fire proof safe that was $75. So, I consider it a bargain. Shipping was slow...about 10-12 dats UPS It arrived, undamaged. Instructions were clear and easy. Openes and closes nicely. The weight is what one would expect. The size is great and cane with a shelf. Perfect for my legal papers, 2 hand guns, valuables with plenty of room to spare. Id recommend it by my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Installation bolts are not included
customer_reviews.text: One of the features I looked for was a safe being waterproof (for which I paid extra). No mention was made on the Amazon description that this model did not come with bolts to secure it to the floor. Once you make a trip to the hardware store and purchase bolts to install, drill through the inside of the safe, you find out it is no longer waterproof. Unfortunately, you don't find out any of this information until you receive it and read the owner's manual. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mattucci

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't ship well
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived all banged up. I certainly question its integrity in a fire or water event now. Too big and heavy for me to haul it back to a UPS store to return it, so I'll just have to hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: SENTRY SAFE 1.23 CUBIC FEET
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe for security, it is heavy, 2 hundred and 50 lbs. Also you can fasten it to the wall or floor or both. It also has a light in the safe, when you use the digital code on the front, and open the door the light comes on, or you can turn it off, the light has high and low. It has three section in the safe and has hooks on the door for keys and a slot on the door for other things. GET ONE FOR YOUR SELF. James D. North
customer_reviews.author: James D North

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with bolt down hardware!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically checked before buying to see if it was able to bolt down and it implyed it comes with bolt down hardware in description pictures and in frequently asked questions but we with no bolt down hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Let me add my voice to those who received a damaged safe. (See photos.) Does it still work? Yes. Is it still fireproof? Who knows? Waterproof? Who knows? It still locks and seems OK, but the fact remains that itarrivex damaged. I don’t like paying full price for a damaged product. One would think that Sentry could learn to ship their product in such a way as to illuminate damage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in transit?
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, my safe arrived with some large dents in it. I'm not sure if there are a bunch of these being shipped damaged and/or used, but mine also seemed a bit dirty and had a few hand prints inside. It still functions and I was not in the mood to ship this thing back, so giving it 2 stars. If you have alternative options, you may want to pursue those judging from the number of reviews with similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe and was easy enough to bolt to the floor. Nice size to hold lots of our things - documents, medication, etc. The top shelf slides out. There are hooks on the door for necklaces. I especially like that the battery compartment is on the outside so I never have to worry about the batteries dying and trying to remember where I hid the key (I have a smaller safe that has an internal battery compartment. I sure hope I remember where the key is when I need it.)
customer_reviews.author: Janine F

customer_reviews.title: Great item at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this safe. Mine did come with a slight bit of damage to an edge, but was able to hammer it back down. Also, I think the description is wrong for the item. It says batteries are included but aren't required. Well they definitely are required but mine didn't come with them included lol. Other than that, I'm very happy. I would probably have it replaced if it wasn't so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The door / door hinge is glued (epoxy) onto the exterior of the box.  This is not a SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a SAFE! The door / door hinge is glued w/ epoxy onto the exterior of the box. The entire hinge is exposed to the outside and it would take less than 15 seconds with a hammer OR crow bar to remove the entire door. Returned immediately. I am very suspect of the 5 star reviews of this product.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open.
customer_reviews.text: So far not happy with this. Cannot get the safe to open. No customer service available on weekends. Only available during the time that I work so I now have an expensive black box. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Great but.....
customer_reviews.text: This product is great except when I received it the top was damaged like someone dropped it before it was packed. I wanted to send it back but figured it was a hassle to return it. Other than that works great.
customer_reviews.author: julian hunter

customer_reviews.title: heavy, kinda small inside, but suits my needs
customer_reviews.text: The safe i got was absolutely filthy, especially on the inside. Not sure what all that crud was but the internals were completely covered in it. I had no issues with the code as some other reviews mentioned and suits my needs. The walls are VERY thick so the space inside is significantly less than the outside would make it seem.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smajlovic

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, smooth dial. What I was looking for. Arrived banged up.
customer_reviews.text: It's a safe. It's heavy, holds stuff, and seems durable. The dial is smooth, and using it is not an issue. Unfortunately, the unit arrived damaged from factory. The packaging was not damaged, but the safe was. Pictures included. Damage is not enough to warrant the hassle of a return, as it seems to be only cosmetic. Otherwise, this would be a 5-star review. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We received our safe yesterday. We were a little worried about damages that others had, but we had none. The safe was packed well, the box was undamaged. There were no dents or scratches anywhere. Combination works just fine, smooth operation. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Retired75th

customer_reviews.title: I am well pleased with the Combination safe
customer_reviews.text: I am well pleased with the Combination safe, is simple and rugged and it doesn't have electronics key pad which can failed on you when the battery is dead and you lost the freaking key! Take it from me I am one of those idiots who lost the key.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Chan.

customer_reviews.title: Dented on delivery
customer_reviews.text: My safe was also dented in the exact same spot many others have noted. Which was the top right back corner of the safe. Not sure why but it's kinda interesting that multiple people are all saying the same thing. I'm not to worried about it as long as it doesn't compromise the safe in anyway. I do agree that the safe handle could have been made out of something other than plastic. This is a great starter safe for many folks with a pretty low price investment. Overall I do wish that the inside had just a bit more space as it doesn't fit documents inside binders but it will fit folders just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: safe is safe
customer_reviews.text: the dial does not move easily. It sticks and sometimes locks up. The size is fine and I like the safe fine except for the dial. I worry that one day it is just not going to open up.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes D.

customer_reviews.title: customer service they never respond
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is that all the negative reviews about this product we're wrong this product is awesome it works just fine the only thing I don't like is the fact that the Tumblr is plastic and the handle is plastic that's the only thing I dislike about it but all in all it's a solid product
customer_reviews.author: Bootman

customer_reviews.title: Used item
customer_reviews.text: There was no paper work in this item with combination. Item damage with dents and scratches.no instructions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: People packed a damaged product!!
customer_reviews.text: This came in a box that was completely Undamaged so it had to be boxed with the dings and bends in it. Also the front turn dial was popped out but we were able to put it back on. The handle to open it is flimsy plastic. We live in the country so it is going to be difficult to send this heavy thing back. I’m very disappointed in what I got. Who knows if the damage done makes it less secure to fire and water?
customer_reviews.author: GFowl

customer_reviews.title: Plastic lever handle makes it feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic lever handle makes it feel cheap and external hinge could make it easy to defeat.
customer_reviews.author: Scott  L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, was kinda skeptical buying it after I read some reviews how the product got damaged during shipping. But mine arrived just with 2 scratches. Tried uploading the photos but don’t know how. Overall not bad, we’ll see for how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolae Cojocaru

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Home/Office Safe
customer_reviews.text: We bought this safe to replace one that was identical, but with this safe, neither nor my wife have to be a "safe cracker" to open it. Just use the digital code that it comes with or set your own.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Woodward (Texas)

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: This safe sucks. Despite its price, it's remarkably cheaply manufactured. It reminds me of a mini fridge in its construction. It arrived late, had dents in the side, and the adhesive bonding the inside plastic to the metal outside had run, or something, and left white residue around the opening. It had dust all over it and was poorly packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Watson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Cant change base code. Smaller than expected. Not large enough for a laptop. Inside plastic feels cheap
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke on my Sentry Safe in approximately 1 year after purchase. It is not worth your time and money. I would caution anyone who is thinking about this safe to rethink it. Do your research. I am sure others have had issues as well. Take our reviews seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hays

customer_reviews.title: Plastic handle to open the safe doesn’t feel sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It just does not feel like a very sturdy safe, the opening handle feels like I could break it off with one hand. It’s made out of plastic very surprised for a safe to have a handle that opens the door made out of plastic. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RSM660

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but came with a dent.
customer_reviews.text: So far it works good, but mine came with a dent in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Monowara Begum

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out.
customer_reviews.text: The first safe I received was all banged up. I returned it and was sent a replacement one. The replacement one was a dial instead of digital key pad. I returned it and bought the same digital one from another store.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: Came dented and not sure if it is water resistant so much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Nothing on package to say handle with care, packaging did not protect safe and safe obviously can't take much abuse. I tried to do an exchange and I would need to drive over an hour to bring it to a UPS store.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Safe not working
customer_reviews.text: We received our safe but the thing has locked up and now will not open or reset to be used.. It is now useless to me after spending money on this and I am very disappointed and we need to send it back to get a refund or purchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy! The dial is plastic- you can't turn it smoothly. I closed the door and now I can't open it. The dial turns, then gets stuck. I expected a metal dial like Masterlocks padlocks. This is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to open . Only use is it acouple times a month . Hear noises and handel is garbage
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: The dial sort of sticks. Kind of hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: jean bittner

customer_reviews.title: Great small safe for meds-keep everyone safe!
customer_reviews.text: Great safe for meds. It’s very roomy. Easy to open and sturdy enough my big butt can sit on it! Lol. Still small enough you can relocate it when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Chism

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This safe was bigger inside than I expected. It fits all my important documents and possessions. Everything is now secure from fire, water and theft.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep passports and other paper work in. Works for just what I need. It’s a dial control lock which is kind of a pain ( but knew that before buying). It’s a solid safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jolain

customer_reviews.title: Returned Sentry Safe
customer_reviews.text: I cant actually comment on the safe itself. I had order the digital safe but was send a dial one. They refunded the purchase and paid for return shipping. I will say the hinges protruded more than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: karmanleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good safe for the value - just not great
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this safe with the exception of the cheap feel to the handle - it is fine but feels cheap. The lock and combo work very smoothly and it is very simple to operate. For a fire safe it is fine for a burglar safe it is to light it need to be much heavier. The claim on the site is that is is made of steel - it feels like it is made of plastic this may not be the case I cannot tell. All in all for valuable papers and a small amount of cash it is a bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MARK O

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far. It requires 4 AAA batteries but I had them on hand so that was no big deal. Plenty of space for files and other valuables! Easy to jump in and use. One pointer though... it was kinda hard at first to figure out which number on the back of the SentrySafe manual was the combo to the safe. Make an educated guess (I believe mine was 5-6 numbers). I tested the safe and it worked with the combo just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure every battery is full
customer_reviews.text: Got the safe, put one low battery in it and it wouldn’t open. Changed it out and it works, so just make sure all of your batteries are full before you try to open it
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Large & durable
customer_reviews.text: This safe is exactly what we had been looking for. It very large and durable. We were able to store all of our paperwork, firearms and other items in it and still have room.
customer_reviews.author: S. Young

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the safe. Perfect size for closet. Well packaged, do dents or dings despite weight of safe. Add batteries and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Georgianna

customer_reviews.title: Bolt down kit????  Where is it?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it clearly lists, safe, manual and bolt down kit. I got no bolt down kit. Whats up with that? See picture and just know upfront BEFORE you buy that it does NOT come with one or mine was left off.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered damaged..dented and crushed..it was a gift and we were very dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: D Chalifour

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: POS, just feels cheap. Brand new have to hit door to open. Too much plastic everywhere. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Parker

customer_reviews.title: We really don't feel "safe"
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work out of the box. Called customer service and they are only available when I am at work.
customer_reviews.author: Eje

customer_reviews.title: Good safe but ....
customer_reviews.text: Really like this safe. Only issue was the number dial was not attached when it came. I luckily was able to snap it into place in the correct spot so it lined up and I haven’t had an issue putting combination in. Good safe other than that. Didn’t want to deal with sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: whitless7

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Quality is exceptional for price and easy to use. Will purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Personal protection
customer_reviews.text: This safe seems to be well made and fits super at the location determined for it. Offers some great security. It does seem to be made well and even looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cauthen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and good locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you bolt it down it can easily be stolen. But I bought it t resist fire and water to protect papers. and I believe it will do that.
customer_reviews.author: njb

customer_reviews.title: must bolt to the floor.
customer_reviews.text: good size, sturdy built, metal locking (no plastic key pad buttons), easy latch feature that means it is not always locked, but the door stays closed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't been tested in a fire or burglary, but seems built well enough to resist both. Daughter likes it for her "papers." Heavy! A real strain to get upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: MrEd

customer_reviews.title: Keep important information safe
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to keep our important papers and other belongings safe from water and fire
customer_reviews.author: Wendy estey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Safe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect safe. Not too big - fits nicely under my desk. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and has plenty of space.
customer_reviews.text: Works as its supposed to. And looks GREAT! Can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT IN HOME SAFE
customer_reviews.text: Great product and so glad I purchased. It's the perfect size for the home.
customer_reviews.author: Allisia Christie

customer_reviews.title: Good.Safe!
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Considering the price, it’s a great safe, easy to work. I used the Amazon Installer to professionally install and show me, very helpful. Comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of opening the safe after it's locked.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Pope

customer_reviews.title: I like the safe however the safe came dented
customer_reviews.text: I like the safe however the safe came dented. The shipping box showed no sign of damage. I'm going to keep the safe because it seems like a pain to return it.
customer_reviews.author: william d hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Safe shipped  locked. Opening instruction were incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: Had to call support center to be able to open. Factory instructions are incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Sheinin

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Has not been tested for water resistant or fire but it seems to be very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: KATE ANDREWS

customer_reviews.title: Buy the one with the combination lock
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews and was confused that some referenced the digital lock that requires batteries. My combination lock safe arrived undamaged and works great. It can be mounted to wall or floor from inside, hardware not included. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money...
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a good product. The features are self-explanatory and it has held up well without issue to condensation or other hazards I've encountered in the past with similar products. The only complaint I've had so far? There should be a feature to set a customized locking code. Also, I should've bought one bigger and that had filing space. lol
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Keep important papers safe
customer_reviews.text: This product is ideal for keeping important papers safe from fire and water. Easy to use and fits into a closet.
customer_reviews.author: user2

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: The safe arrived dented, much the same as I've seen in other reviews. The dent is in the rear of the safe and hopefully will not affect its function. I purchased the digital version, and other than the fact that I can't seem to change the combination, it appears to be functioning ok. I will keep the safe because it's a hassle to return, too bad that a product with a good name is not handled and packaged more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Duffin

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but the only down side is that you can’t bolt it to the ground or the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Toyens

customer_reviews.title: Came with two dents in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The product came with two big dents you can clearly see the white color stuff in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: needplace to anchor it down
customer_reviews.text: this product was damaged..no papers to return very very unhappy with product
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bryan

customer_reviews.title: No way to mount in wall
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I expected with the exception of the lock. It looked and felt cheep, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: mike lacoste

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy. Don't know about the fire an water. Don't think anyone will walk off with it. Only wish I could make up my own number.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: I was purchasing this to put important files into it. But the safe is too short so I had to angle the files in order to close the door.
customer_reviews.author: S. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I think i did the right choice, this safe is very made
customer_reviews.author: Dutra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe. It was my mistake of not ordering the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: deb swan

customer_reviews.title: It does not come with the bolt down hardware as said in item description
customer_reviews.text: We love our safe.. but for the price it should come with bolt down hardware as it says in the amazon description. dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Frostina

customer_reviews.title: Can’t open it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t open the safe! Used the combination and nothing happens. Customer service is only open when I’m at work, so I haven’t been able to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Parker

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Handle feels weak, not sure if I like that in the future it could break.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Arias

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Only feature which could be better is the plastic handle. Should be metal. Other than that, high quality safe.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Markham

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with bolt down kit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised but is no longer waterproof if you bolt it down.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great for our busy office.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: not a good sentry safe vey
customer_reviews.text: the safe i ordered from oct 2017 cant be unlocked anymore. followed the instructions from the internet and didnt help at all. not a good sentry safe vey disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MarRY del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. But the directions were very confusing. Opening the safe for the first time was very frustrating. They should have better directions. Over all I like the product. Shipping can be improved. The box was damaged when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, but be sure to leave the combination ...
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, but be sure to leave the combination where you can find it. IF you lose it you have to pay to have it sent to you again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Good product but arrived damaged and is hard to return. Ultimately decided to keep it. Damage is cosmetic only - frame is bent in the back - but still frustrating. It will do the job but I wish I had picked one up at Home Depot and avoided this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: fhk3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and great price for what you get very recommended
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I received the item like this , what are u guys planning to do with this, it’s on the second floor , I cannot mail and it’s defective
customer_reviews.author: Hermajesty

product_meta.title: SentrySafe SFW123FUL Fireproof Waterproof Safe with Digital Keypad, 1.23 Cubic Feet
product_meta.description: Style:Digital Keypad, interior lightThe SentrySafe SFW123FUL Fireproof Safe and Waterproof Safe offers ETL Verified water protection and UL Classified fire protection for your important documents, digital media, and other valuables. This safe is also equipped to protect from unwanted access, with solid steel construction and a pry-resistant hinge bar. With a key rack, door tray, and door pocket, this safe is ideal for keeping your irreplaceable items secure and organized.
feature_bullets: Fireproof safe is UL Classified to endure 1 hour at 1700°F and keep interior temperatures safe for irreplaceable documents, valuables, DVDs, and USBs; ETL Verified to withstand a 15 foot fall during a fire and remain closed
Waterproof safe is ETL Verified for 24 hours of protection in water up to 8 inches deep offering peace of mind in the event of a flood

Set your own digital combination fire safe for strong security; digital combination safe features four live-locking bolts, steel construction, pry-resistant hinge bar, shelf, tray, and bolt down hardware
Exterior: 16.3 in. W x 19.3 in. D x 17.8 in. H; door requires 14.75 in. of clearance to fully open; Interior: 12.6 in. W x 11.9 in. D x 13.8 in. H; large 1.23 cubic foot capacity; weighs 86 pounds

For optimal performance, SentrySafe recommends the use of four high-quality, name branded, alkaline AA batteries with an expiration date of 8-10 years from the current year. Generic and rechargeable batteries often do not have the lifespan needed to support long term usage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars786 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
